attributes.action: DWP staff should be trained to give the same information every time they are contacted
attributes.additional_details:
DWP staff should be trained to give the same answers to the same question.  For example, if a member of staff is asked a question on one day and the following day, the DWP are contacted with the same question, a different answer is given.

This needs to be addressed and the staff at the DWP should be trained to respect whoever rings them.
